title: When Saigon Surrendered: A Kentucky Mystery
description: A Kentucky teenager recruits friends to derail a human trafficking ring in the aftermath of the Vietnam War. War never ends: It sends shock waves down through the generations that follow. Russell Ray Teague is a Kentucky teenager whose life is turned upside down with the fall of Saigon in the Spring of 1975. He struggles with loss and guilt as he seeks to unravel a family mystery and strives to find his place in a world that is darker and more dangerous than he ever imagined. This is a coming of age story set against the backdrop of a family whose lives are forever changed by war.Fans of Ron Rash, Ivan Doig, and Craig Johnson will likely enjoy this historical mystery, set in 1975.
author: James Aura
